Kador Ben-Salim (Russian) bụ onye Senegalese-Soviet acrobat, onye agha Red Army na o yikarịrị ka ọ bụ naanị onye na-eme ihe nkiri sitere na ndị Afrịka na ihe nkiri Soviet n'ime afọ 1920 na mmalite afọ 1930
Onye agha obodo, ọ pụtara na ọ dịkarịa ala ihe nkiri asatọ, gụnyere The Return of Nathan Becker, ihe nkiri ụda nke mbụ nke asụsụ Yiddish.
Ben-Salim bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'otu ndị na-eme njem na Morocco nke rutere mba Moscow n'afọ 1912
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1916, ọ gara Almaty wee sonye n'òtù ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke Alexander Sosin na-eduzi (onye mbụ mere njem abụọ n'ihu)
Mgbe Russian Revolution na mmalite nke agha obodo, ọ sonyeere ndị Red Army ma jee ozi n'otu n'ime ndị agha ịnyịnya nke mba ụwa n'okpuru iwu nke Vasily Chapayev.
